module LambdaCube.Core.Type
data V2 a
V2 :: !a -> !a -> V2 a
data V3 a
V3 :: !a -> !a -> !a -> V3 a
data V4 a
V4 :: !a -> !a -> !a -> !a -> V4 a
type M22F = V2 V2F
type M23F = V3 V2F
type M24F = V4 V2F
type M32F = V2 V3F
type M33F = V3 V3F
type M34F = V4 V3F
type M42F = V2 V4F
type M43F = V3 V4F
type M44F = V4 V4F
type V2F = V2 Float
type V3F = V3 Float
type V4F = V4 Float
type V2I = V2 Int32
type V3I = V3 Int32
type V4I = V4 Int32
type V2U = V2 Word32
type V3U = V3 Word32
type V4U = V4 Word32
type V2B = V2 Bool
type V3B = V3 Bool
type V4B = V4 Bool

VBool :: !Bool -> Value

VV4U :: !V4U -> Value

VV3I :: !V3I -> Value
VV4I :: !V4I -> Value

VM33F :: !M33F -> Value
VM34F :: !M34F -> Value
VM42F :: !M42F -> Value
VM43F :: !M43F -> Value

Single :: !InputType -> Ty
Tuple :: [Ty] -> Ty
Unknown :: String -> Ty

data PointSpriteCoordOrigin
LowerLeft :: PointSpriteCoordOrigin
UpperLeft :: PointSpriteCoordOrigin
data PointSize
PointSize :: Float -> PointSize
ProgramPointSize :: PointSize
data PolygonOffset
NoOffset :: PolygonOffset
Offset :: Float -> Float -> PolygonOffset
data FrontFace
CCW :: FrontFace
CW :: FrontFace
data PolygonMode
PolygonPoint :: PointSize -> PolygonMode
PolygonLine :: Float -> PolygonMode
PolygonFill :: PolygonMode
data ProvokingVertex
FirstVertex :: ProvokingVertex
LastVertex :: ProvokingVertex
data CullMode
CullNone :: CullMode
CullFront :: FrontFace -> CullMode
CullBack :: FrontFace -> CullMode
type DepthFunction = ComparisonFunction
data ComparisonFunction
Never :: ComparisonFunction
Less :: ComparisonFunction
Equal :: ComparisonFunction
Lequal :: ComparisonFunction
Greater :: ComparisonFunction
Notequal :: ComparisonFunction
Gequal :: ComparisonFunction
Always :: ComparisonFunction
data StencilOperation
OpZero :: StencilOperation
OpKeep :: StencilOperation
OpReplace :: StencilOperation
OpIncr :: StencilOperation
OpIncrWrap :: StencilOperation
OpDecr :: StencilOperation
OpDecrWrap :: StencilOperation
OpInvert :: StencilOperation
data BlendEquation
FuncAdd :: BlendEquation
FuncSubtract :: BlendEquation
FuncReverseSubtract :: BlendEquation
Min :: BlendEquation
Max :: BlendEquation
data BlendingFactor
Zero :: BlendingFactor
One :: BlendingFactor
SrcColor :: BlendingFactor
OneMinusSrcColor :: BlendingFactor
DstColor :: BlendingFactor
OneMinusDstColor :: BlendingFactor
SrcAlpha :: BlendingFactor
OneMinusSrcAlpha :: BlendingFactor
DstAlpha :: BlendingFactor
OneMinusDstAlpha :: BlendingFactor
ConstantColor :: BlendingFactor

SrcAlphaSaturate :: BlendingFactor
data LogicOperation
Clear :: LogicOperation
And :: LogicOperation
AndReverse :: LogicOperation
Copy :: LogicOperation
AndInverted :: LogicOperation
Noop :: LogicOperation
Xor :: LogicOperation
Or :: LogicOperation
Nor :: LogicOperation
Equiv :: LogicOperation
Invert :: LogicOperation
OrReverse :: LogicOperation
CopyInverted :: LogicOperation
OrInverted :: LogicOperation
Nand :: LogicOperation
Set :: LogicOperation
data StencilOps
StencilOps :: StencilOperation -> StencilOperation -> StencilOps

-- | Used for front faced triangles and other primitives.
frontStencilOp :: StencilOps -> StencilOperation

-- | Used for back faced triangles.
backStencilOp :: StencilOps -> StencilOperation
data StencilTests
StencilTests :: StencilTest -> StencilTest -> StencilTests
data StencilTest
StencilTest :: ComparisonFunction -> Int32 -> Word32 -> StencilTest

-- | The function used to compare the <tt>stencilReference</tt> and the
--   stencil buffers value with.
stencilComparision :: StencilTest -> ComparisonFunction

-- | The value to compare with the stencil buffer's value.
stencilReference :: StencilTest -> Int32

-- | A bit mask with ones in each position that should be compared and
--   written to the stencil buffer.
stencilMask :: StencilTest -> Word32
data Filter
PointFilter :: Filter
LinearFilter :: Filter
data EdgeMode
Repeat :: EdgeMode
MirroredRepeat :: EdgeMode
ClampToEdge :: EdgeMode
ClampToBorder :: EdgeMode
data FetchPrimitive
Points :: FetchPrimitive
Lines :: FetchPrimitive
Triangles :: FetchPrimitive
LinesAdjacency :: FetchPrimitive

data OutputPrimitive
TrianglesOutput :: OutputPrimitive
LinesOutput :: OutputPrimitive
PointsOutput :: OutputPrimitive
data ColorArity
Red :: ColorArity
RG :: ColorArity
RGB :: ColorArity
RGBA :: ColorArity
data Blending
NoBlending :: Blending
BlendLogicOp :: LogicOperation -> Blending
Blend :: (BlendEquation, BlendEquation) -> ((BlendingFactor, BlendingFactor), (BlendingFactor, BlendingFactor)) -> V4F -> Blending
data RasterContext
PointCtx :: PointSize -> Float -> PointSpriteCoordOrigin -> RasterContext
LineCtx :: Float -> ProvokingVertex -> RasterContext
TriangleCtx :: CullMode -> PolygonMode -> PolygonOffset -> ProvokingVertex -> RasterContext
data FragmentOperation
DepthOp :: DepthFunction -> Bool -> FragmentOperation
StencilOp :: StencilTests -> StencilOps -> StencilOps -> FragmentOperation
ColorOp :: Blending -> Value -> FragmentOperation
data Image
DepthImage :: Int -> Float -> Image
StencilImage :: Int -> Int32 -> Image
ColorImage :: Int -> Value -> Image
UnclearedImage :: Int -> Image
data TextureDataType
FloatT :: ColorArity -> TextureDataType

WordT :: ColorArity -> TextureDataType
ShadowT :: TextureDataType

module LambdaCube.Core.Util.BiMap
data BiMap a
BiMap :: (Map a Int) -> (IntMap a) -> BiMap a
empty :: BiMap a
lookup_key :: Ord a => a -> BiMap a -> Maybe Int
lookup_val :: Int -> BiMap a -> a
insert :: Ord a => a -> BiMap a -> (Int, BiMap a)
size :: BiMap a -> Int
instance Show a => Show (BiMap a)
instance (Ord a, Read a) => Read (BiMap a)

module LambdaCube.Core.DeBruijn
type ExpId = Int
data DAG
DAG :: BiMap Exp -> IntMap Ty -> IntMap Int -> Vector [Exp] -> Vector [Exp] -> DAG
dagExp :: DAG -> BiMap Exp
dagTy :: DAG -> IntMap Ty
dagCount :: DAG -> IntMap Int
expUniverseV :: DAG -> Vector [Exp]
gpUniverseV :: DAG -> Vector [Exp]
expUniverse :: Int -> Exp -> Vector IntSet -> IntSet
mkExpUni :: DAG -> Vector [Exp]
gpUniverse :: Int -> Exp -> Vector IntSet -> IntSet
mkGPUni :: DAG -> Vector [Exp]
emptyDAG :: DAG
hashcons :: Ty -> Exp -> State DAG ExpId
toExp :: DAG -> ExpId -> Exp
toExpId :: DAG -> Exp -> ExpId
expIdType :: DAG -> ExpId -> Ty
expType :: DAG -> Exp -> Ty
expIdCount :: DAG -> ExpId -> Int
expCount :: DAG -> Exp -> Int
data Exp
Lam :: !ExpId -> Exp
Body :: !ExpId -> Exp
Var :: Int -> String -> Exp
Apply :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
Const :: !Value -> Exp
PrimVar :: !ByteString -> Exp
Uni :: !ByteString -> Exp
Tup :: [ExpId] -> Exp
Prj :: Int -> !ExpId -> Exp
Cond :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
PrimApp :: !PrimFun -> !ExpId -> Exp
Sampler :: !Filter -> !EdgeMode -> !ExpId -> Exp
Loop :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
VertexOut :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> [ExpId] -> [ExpId] -> Exp
GeometryOut :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> [ExpId] -> [ExpId] -> Exp
FragmentOut :: [ExpId] -> Exp
FragmentOutDepth :: !ExpId -> [ExpId] -> Exp
FragmentOutRastDepth :: [ExpId] -> Exp
Fetch :: ByteString -> FetchPrimitive -> [(ByteString, InputType)] -> Exp
Transform :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
Reassemble :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
Rasterize :: RasterContext -> !ExpId -> Exp
FrameBuffer :: [Image] -> Exp
Accumulate :: !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
PrjFrameBuffer :: ByteString -> Int -> !ExpId -> Exp
PrjImage :: ByteString -> Int -> !ExpId -> Exp
TextureSlot :: ByteString -> TextureType -> Exp
Texture :: TextureType -> Value -> MipMap -> [ExpId] -> Exp
Flat :: !ExpId -> Exp
Smooth :: !ExpId -> Exp
NoPerspective :: !ExpId -> Exp
GeometryShader :: Int -> OutputPrimitive -> Int -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> !ExpId -> Exp
PassAll :: Exp
Filter :: !ExpId -> Exp
SamplerOut :: ByteString -> !ExpId -> Exp
ScreenOut :: !ExpId -> Exp
MultiOut :: [ExpId] -> Exp
AccumulationContext :: !(Maybe ExpId) -> [FragmentOperation] -> Exp
class ExpC exp
let_ :: ExpC exp => exp -> (exp -> exp) -> exp
lam :: ExpC exp => Ty -> exp -> exp
body :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
var :: ExpC exp => Ty -> Int -> String -> exp
apply :: ExpC exp => Ty -> exp -> exp -> exp
const_ :: ExpC exp => Ty -> Value -> exp
primVar :: ExpC exp => Ty -> ByteString -> exp
uni :: ExpC exp => Ty -> ByteString -> exp
tup :: ExpC exp => Ty -> [exp] -> exp
prj :: ExpC exp => Ty -> Int -> exp -> exp
cond :: ExpC exp => Ty -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp
primApp :: ExpC exp => Ty -> PrimFun -> exp -> exp
sampler :: ExpC exp => Ty -> Filter -> EdgeMode -> exp -> exp
loop :: ExpC exp => Ty -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp
vertexOut :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp -> [exp] -> [exp] -> exp
geometryOut :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp -> exp -> [exp] -> [exp] -> exp
fragmentOut :: ExpC exp => [exp] -> exp
fragmentOutDepth :: ExpC exp => exp -> [exp] -> exp
fragmentOutRastDepth :: ExpC exp => [exp] -> exp
fetch :: ExpC exp => ByteString -> FetchPrimitive -> [(ByteString, InputType)] -> exp
transform :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp -> exp
reassemble :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp -> exp
rasterize :: ExpC exp => RasterContext -> exp -> exp
frameBuffer :: ExpC exp => [Image] -> exp
accumulationContext :: ExpC exp => Maybe exp -> [FragmentOperation] -> exp
accumulate :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp
prjFrameBuffer :: ExpC exp => ByteString -> Int -> exp -> exp
prjImage :: ExpC exp => ByteString -> Int -> exp -> exp
textureSlot :: ExpC exp => ByteString -> TextureType -> exp
texture :: ExpC exp => TextureType -> Value -> MipMap -> [exp] -> exp
flat :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
smooth :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
noPerspective :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
geometryShader :: ExpC exp => Int -> OutputPrimitive -> Int -> exp -> exp -> exp -> exp
passAll :: ExpC exp => exp
filter_ :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
samplerOut :: ExpC exp => ByteString -> exp -> exp
screenOut :: ExpC exp => exp -> exp
multiOut :: ExpC exp => [exp] -> exp
newtype N
N :: State DAG ExpId -> N
unN :: N -> State DAG ExpId
instance Eq Exp
instance Ord Exp
instance Show Exp
instance Read Exp
instance Show DAG
instance Read DAG
instance ExpC N

module LambdaCube.Core.Traversals
class HasExp a
expUniverse :: HasExp a => DAG -> a -> [Exp]
expUniverse' :: HasExp a => DAG -> a -> [Exp]
gpUniverse :: DAG -> Exp -> [Exp]
gpUniverse' :: DAG -> Exp -> [Exp]
findFrameBuffer :: DAG -> Exp -> Exp
renderChain :: DAG -> Exp -> [Exp]
drawOperations :: DAG -> Exp -> [Exp]
instance HasExp Exp
instance HasExp ExpId
instance HasExp a => HasExp [a]
